PSCT.Vegas:
① During your Main Phase 2: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; 
add 1 "Bujin" monster from your Deck to your hand. 
(You can't activate cards/effects the turn you activate this effect, except "Bujin" cards/effects). 
(You can only use the effect of "Bujingi Peacock" once per turn).
